item.text: These are the journeys of the Israelites, who went out of the land of Egypt by their divisions under the authority of Moses and Aaron.
Moses recorded their departures according to their journeys, by the commandment of the Lord; now these are their journeys according to their departures.

They <st data-num="05265" class="">departed</st> from <st data-num="07486" class="">Rameses</st> in the <st data-num="07223" class="">first</st> <st data-num="02320" class="">month</st>, on the <st data-num="02568 06240">fifteenth</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">day</st> of the <st data-num="07223" class="">first</st> <st data-num="02320" class="">month</st>; on <st data-num="04283" class="">the day after</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="06453" class="">Passover</st> the <st data-num="01121 03478">Israelites</st> <st data-num="03318" class="">went out</st> <st data-num="03027 07311">defiantly</st><n id="2" /> in <st data-num="05869">plain sight</st><n id="3" /> of <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="04713" class="">Egyptians</st>.
Now the Egyptians were burying all their firstborn, whom the Lord had killed among them; the Lord also executed judgments on their gods.
The Israelites traveled from Rameses and camped in Sukkoth.
They traveled from Sukkoth, and camped in Etham, which is on the edge of the desert.

They <st data-num="05265" class="">traveled</st> from <st data-num="0864" class="">Etham</st>, and <st data-num="07725" class="">turned again</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">to</st> <st data-num="06367" class="">Pi Hahiroth</st>, <st data-num="0834" class="">which</st> is <st data-num="05921 06440">before</st> <st data-num="01189" class="">Baal Zephon</st>; and they <st data-num="02583" class="">camped</st> <st data-num="06440" class="">before</st> <st data-num="04024" class="">Migdal</st>.

They <st data-num="05265" class="">traveled</st> from <st data-num="06367" class="">Pi Hahiroth</st>,<n id="1" /> and <st data-num="05674" class="">passed</st> through the <st data-num="08432" class="">middle</st> of the <st data-num="03220" class="">sea</st> into the <st data-num="04057" class="">wilderness</st>, and <st data-num="01980" class="">went</st> <st data-num="07969" class="">three</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">days’</st> <st data-num="01870" class="">journey</st> in the <st data-num="04057" class="">wilderness</st> of <st data-num="0864" class="">Etham</st>, and <st data-num="02583" class="">camped</st> in <st data-num="04785" class="">Marah</st>.
They traveled from Marah and came to Elim; in Elim there are twelve fountains of water and seventy palm trees, so they camped there.
They traveled from Elim, and camped by the Red Sea.

They <st data-num="05265" class="">traveled</st> from the <st data-num="05488" class="">Red</st> <st data-num="03220" class="">Sea</st> and <st data-num="02583" class="">camped</st> in the <st data-num="04057" class="">wilderness</st> of <st data-num="05512" class="">Sin</st>.

They <st data-num="05265" class="">traveled</st> from the <st data-num="04057" class="">wilderness</st> of <st data-num="05512" class="">Sin</st> and <st data-num="02583" class="">camped</st> in <st data-num="01850" class="">Dophkah</st>.
And they traveled from Dophkah, and camped in Alush.
They traveled from Alush and camped at Rephidim, where there was no water for the people to drink.
They traveled from Rephidim and camped in the desert of Sinai.
They traveled from the desert of Sinai and camped at Kibroth Hattaavah.

They <st data-num="05265" class="">traveled</st> from <st data-num="06914" class="">Kibroth Hattaavah</st> and <st data-num="02583" class="">camped</st> at <st data-num="02698" class="">Hazeroth</st>.
They <st data-num="05265" class="">traveled</st> from <st data-num="02698" class="">Hazeroth</st> and <st data-num="02583" class="">camped</st> in <st data-num="07575" class="">Rithmah</st>.
They <st data-num="05265" class="">traveled</st> from <st data-num="07575" class="">Rithmah</st> and <st data-num="02583" class="">camped</st> at <st data-num="07428" class="">Rimmon Perez</st>.
They <st data-num="05265" class="">traveled</st> from <st data-num="07428" class="">Rimmon Perez</st> and <st data-num="02583" class="">camped</st> in <st data-num="03841" class="">Libnah</st>.
They <st data-num="05265" class="">traveled</st> from <st data-num="03841" class="">Libnah</st> and <st data-num="02583" class="">camped</st> at <st data-num="07446" class="">Rissah</st>.
They <st data-num="05265" class="">traveled</st> from <st data-num="07446" class="">Rissah</st> and <st data-num="02583" class="">camped</st> in <st data-num="06954" class="">Kehelathah</st>.

They <st data-num="05265" class="">traveled</st> from <st data-num="06954" class="">Kehelathah</st> and <st data-num="02583" class="">camped</st> at <st data-num="02022" class="">Mount</st> <st data-num="08234" class="">Shepher</st>.

They <st data-num="05265" class="">traveled</st> from <st data-num="02022" class="">Mount</st> <st data-num="08234" class="">Shepher</st> and <st data-num="02583" class="">camped</st> in <st data-num="02732" class="">Haradah</st>.
They <st data-num="05265" class="">traveled</st> from <st data-num="02732" class="">Haradah</st> and <st data-num="02583" class="">camped</st> in <st data-num="04722" class="">Makheloth</st>.
They <st data-num="05265" class="">traveled</st> from <st data-num="04722" class="">Makheloth</st> and <st data-num="02583" class="">camped</st> at <st data-num="08480" class="">Tahath</st>.
They <st data-num="05265" class="">traveled</st> from <st data-num="08480" class="">Tahath</st> and <st data-num="02583" class="">camped</st> at <st data-num="08646" class="">Terah</st>.
They <st data-num="05265" class="">traveled</st> from <st data-num="08646" class="">Terah</st> and <st data-num="02583" class="">camped</st> in <st data-num="04989" class="">Mithcah</st>.
They <st data-num="05265" class="">traveled</st> from <st data-num="04989" class="">Mithcah</st> and <st data-num="02583" class="">camped</st> in <st data-num="02832" class="">Hashmonah</st>.
They <st data-num="05265" class="">traveled</st> from <st data-num="02832" class="">Hashmonah</st> and <st data-num="02583" class="">camped</st> in <st data-num="04149" class="">Moseroth</st>.
They <st data-num="05265" class="">traveled</st> from <st data-num="04149" class="">Moseroth</st> and <st data-num="02583" class="">camped</st> in <st data-num="01142" class="">Bene Jaakan</st>.
They <st data-num="05265" class="">traveled</st> from <st data-num="01142" class="">Bene Jaakan</st> and <st data-num="02583" class="">camped</st> at <st data-num="02735" class="">Hor Haggidgad</st>.
They <st data-num="05265" class="">traveled</st> from <st data-num="02735" class="">Hor Haggidgad</st> and <st data-num="02583" class="">camped</st> in <st data-num="03193" class="">Jotbathah</st>.
They <st data-num="05265" class="">traveled</st> from <st data-num="03193" class="">Jotbathah</st> and <st data-num="02583" class="">camped</st> in <st data-num="05684" class="">Abronah</st>.
They <st data-num="05265" class="">traveled</st> from <st data-num="05684" class="">Abronah</st> and <st data-num="02583" class="">camped</st> at <st data-num="06100" class="">Ezion Geber</st>.
They traveled from Ezion Geber and camped in the wilderness of Zin, that is, Kadesh.
They traveled from Kadesh and camped at Mount Hor at the edge of the land of Edom.
Aaron the priest ascended Mount Hor at the command of the Lord, and he died there in the fortieth year after the Israelites had come out of the land of Egypt on the first day of the fifth month.

Now <st data-num="0175" class="">Aaron</st> was <st data-num="07969 06242 03967">123</st> <st data-num="08141" class="">years</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">old</st> when he <st data-num="04194" class="">died</st> on <st data-num="02022" class="">Mount</st> <st data-num="02023" class="">Hor</st>.
The king of Arad, the Canaanite king who lived in the south of the land of Canaan, heard about the approach of the Israelites.
They traveled from Mount Hor and camped in Zalmonah.
They <st data-num="05265" class="">traveled</st> from <st data-num="06758" class="">Zalmonah</st> and <st data-num="02583" class="">camped</st> in <st data-num="06325" class="">Punon</st>.
They <st data-num="05265" class="">traveled</st> from <st data-num="06325" class="">Punon</st> and <st data-num="02583" class="">camped</st> in <st data-num="088" class="">Oboth</st>.

They <st data-num="05265" class="">traveled</st> from <st data-num="088" class="">Oboth</st> and <st data-num="02583" class="">camped</st> in <st data-num="05863" class="">Iye Abarim</st>, on the <st data-num="01366" class="">border</st> of <st data-num="04124" class="">Moab</st>.

They <st data-num="05265" class="">traveled</st> from <st data-num="05864" class="">Iim</st><n id="1" /> and <st data-num="02583" class="">camped</st> in <st data-num="01769" class="">Dibon</st> <st data-num="01410" class="">Gad</st>.

They <st data-num="05265" class="">traveled</st> from <st data-num="01769" class="">Dibon</st> <st data-num="01410" class="">Gad</st> and <st data-num="02583" class="">camped</st> in <st data-num="05963" class="">Almon Diblathaim</st>.

They <st data-num="05265" class="">traveled</st> from <st data-num="05963" class="">Almon Diblathaim</st> and <st data-num="02583" class="">camped</st> in the <st data-num="02022" class="">mountains</st> of <st data-num="05682" class="">Abarim</st> <st data-num="06440" class="">before</st> <st data-num="05015" class="">Nebo</st>.

They <st data-num="05265" class="">traveled</st> from the <st data-num="02022" class="">mountains</st> of <st data-num="05682" class="">Abarim</st> and <st data-num="02583" class="">camped</st> in the <st data-num="06160" class="">rift valley plains</st><n id="1" /> by <st data-num="04124" class="">Moab</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">along</st> the <st data-num="03383" class="">Jordan</st> River<n id="2" /> across from <st data-num="03405" class="">Jericho</st>.<n id="3" />
They camped by the Jordan, from Beth Jeshimoth as far as Abel Shittim in the rift valley plains of Moab.
The Lord spoke to Moses in the rift valley plains of Moab along the Jordan, across from Jericho. He said:

“<st data-num="01696" class="">Speak</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="01121 03478">Israelites</st> and <st data-num="0559 0413">tell</st> them, ‘<st data-num="03588" class="">When</st> <st data-num="0859" class="">you</st> have <st data-num="05674" class="">crossed</st> the <st data-num="03383" class="">Jordan</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> of <st data-num="03667" class="">Canaan</st>,

you must <st data-num="03423" class="">drive out</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="03427" class="">inhabitants</st> of the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> <st data-num="06440" class="">before</st> you. <st data-num="06" class="">Destroy</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> their <st data-num="04906" class="">carved images</st>, <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> their <st data-num="04541" class="">molten</st> <st data-num="06754" class="">images</st>,<n id="1" /> and <st data-num="08045" class="">demolish</st> their <st data-num="01116" class="">high places</st>.

You must <st data-num="03423" class="">dispossess</st> the inhabitants of the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> and <st data-num="03427" class="">live</st> in it, <st data-num="03588" class="">for</st> I have <st data-num="05414" class="">given</st> you the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> to <st data-num="03423" class="">possess</st> it.

You must <st data-num="05157" class="">divide</st> the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> by <st data-num="01486" class="">lot</st> <st data-num="05157" class="">for an inheritance</st> among your <st data-num="04940" class="">families</st>. To a <st data-num="07227" class="">larger group</st> you must <st data-num="07235" class="">give</st> a <st data-num="07235" class="">larger</st> <st data-num="05159" class="">inheritance</st>, and to a <st data-num="04592" class="">smaller group</st> you must <st data-num="04591" class="">give</st> a <st data-num="04591" class="">smaller</st> <st data-num="05159" class="">inheritance</st>. Everyone’s inheritance must <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> <st data-num="0413 0834">in the place</st> <st data-num="08033" class="">where</st> his <st data-num="01486" class="">lot</st> <st data-num="03318" class="">falls</st>. You must <st data-num="05157" class="">inherit</st> according to your <st data-num="01" class="">ancestral</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="04294" class="">tribes</st>.

But <st data-num="0518" class="">if</st> you do <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="03423" class="">drive out</st> the <st data-num="03427" class="">inhabitants</st> of the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> <st data-num="06440" class="">before</st> you, then <st data-num="01992" class="">those</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">whom</st> you allow to <st data-num="03498" class="">remain</st> will <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> <st data-num="07899" class="">irritants</st> in your <st data-num="05869" class="">eyes</st> and <st data-num="06796" class="">thorns</st> in your <st data-num="06654" class="">side</st>, and will <st data-num="06887" class="">cause</st> you <st data-num="06887" class="">trouble</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">where</st> <st data-num="0859" class="">you</st> will be <st data-num="03427" class="">living</st>.
And what I intended to do to them I will do to you.’”
